iti35:2.1: “Nayidam, bhikkhave, brahmacariyam vussati janakuhanattham, na janalapanattham, na labhasakkarasilokanisamsattham, na ‘iti mam jano janatu’ti.
iti35:2.2: Atha kho idam, bhikkhave, brahmacariyam vussati samvaratthanceva pahanatthanca”ti.
iti35:5.1: Ayampi attho vutto bhagavata, iti me sutanti.
